name: publish-artifact
description: Publish Artifact Details to the artifactz.io repository
author: IKtech Limited

inputs.name: serviceUrl
inputs.label: Web Service URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Artifactz.io web service URL. When omitted production instance url is used (https://artifactor.artifactz.io)

inputs.name: apiToken
inputs.label: API Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifactz.io API token with the write access

inputs.name: stage
inputs.label: Stage
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the stage where artifact will be published. If the stage does not exist it will be created

inputs.name: flow
inputs.label: Flow Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the flow which the artifact in question will be attached to once published

inputs.name: name
inputs.label: Artifact Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the artifact to publish

inputs.name: type
inputs.label: Artifact Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifact's type. Accepted values are: **JAR**, **WAR**, **EAR** and **DockerImage**

inputs.name: groupId
inputs.label: Maven Group Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maven group Id for the Java artifacts

inputs.name: artifactId
inputs.label: Maven Artifact Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maven artifact Id for the Java artifacts

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Artifact Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of the artifact to publish

inputs.name: proxyUrl
inputs.label: Proxy URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the proxy to use to access the Artifactz.io site

inputs.name: proxyUsername
inputs.label: Proxy Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The proxy username when proxy requires authentication

inputs.name: proxyPassword
inputs.label: Proxy Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The proxy password when proxy requires authentication
